stripped_text: The first time each turn you use a piece of hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. click, remove this resource from the game: For each hosted power counter, choose up to 2 cards in your heap with trash abilities. Shuffle the chosen cards into your stack.
text: The first time each turn you use a piece of hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [click], remove this resource from the game: For each hosted power counter, choose up to 2 cards in your heap with [trash] abilities. Shuffle the chosen cards into your stack.
title: The Back
